description:
The MerinoLoft™ Jacket is the perfect insulating layer for skiing or hiking in cold conditions thanks to Icebreaker’s innovative MerinoLoft™ insulation—a natural and cruelty-free insulation that harnesses the natural benefits of merino wool. The jacket’s woven cotton shell features a durable, PFC-free water-repellent finish to shed moisture, while the zoned insulation provides the optimal balance of warmth and breathability. The merino lining helps regulate body temperature and resist odours. Offset shoulder seams reduce friction and front hand pockets secure small essentials.

Three layers of comfort in a lightweight layer, Icebreaker MerinoLoft™ has a durable, water-repellent shell filled with natural merino-fibre batting, with a super-soft lining in 100% merino. Inspired by nature, Icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibres to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics.
name: Icebreaker MerinoLoft Jacket - Mens
